segments.text: I see the boy reaching for the cookie jar, and I can’t help but smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined, stretching as high as he can to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there with him, waiting for her share, and it’s just so cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re being sneaky, but it’s all in good fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember doing the same thing when I was their age.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware, just standing there drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and she hasn’t even noticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like she’s in her own little world, and the kids are in theirs.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies before she catches them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a sweet moment, even if it’s a little chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR
